title: Admission Open for 2025-26 Academic Year
content: We are pleased to announce that admissions are now open for the 2025-26 academic year. Apply now for Computer Engineering program from Grade 9 to 12.
author: Administration

title: Summer Vacation Schedule Announced
content: The summer vacation will commence from July 1, 2025. Classes will resume on August 15, 2025. Students are advised to complete their vacation assignments.
author: Academic Department

title: Annual Sports Day Competition Results
content: Congratulations to all participants of our Annual Sports Day. Red House emerged as the overall champion. Full results are available on our website.
author: Sports Department

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting Scheduled
content: A parent-teacher meeting is scheduled for next month to discuss student progress and upcoming examinations. Date and time will be communicated soon.
author: Administration

title: New Computer Lab Equipment Installed
content: We have upgraded our computer laboratory with latest hardware and software to enhance the learning experience for our students.
author: IT Department
